content: this simple and straightforward crochet cami top makes a perfect first garment project you ll love the spider stitch texture and effortless lacy edges materials i/5 5mm crochet hook 5-10 skeins wecrochet cotlin dk 3 weight 70% tanguis cotton 30% linen yarn 50g and 123yds per ball shown in wallaby colorway stitch marker yarn needle scissors gauge 7 repeats and 13 row in 4 unblocked notes this top is constructed in 2 pieces a front panel and a back panel each panel begins at the bottom and works upward in one piece then splits to work on each half of the top and strap separately my tank was just longer than cropped so there are instructions for adding additional length in the pattern size chart xs - bust 28 length 19 yds 600 s - bust 32 length 19 yds 700 m - bust 36 length 20 yds 750 l - bust 40 length 20 yds 850 xl - bust 44 length 20 yds 950 2x - bust 48 length 21 yds 1100 3x - bust 52 length 21 yds 1150 4x - bust 56 length 22 yds 1300 5x - bust 60 length 22 yds 1400
